    5-Day Wellness Retreat

With fifteen expertly crafted classes, five specialized workshops, unlimited ice bath access, and VIP treatment throughout, this is wellness at the highest level.

    Why Choose the 5-Day Experience?

    Complete Wellness Transformation

    Unlike shorter programs, five days allows for:

    • True Habit Formation - Science says 21-66 days to build habits; 5 days creates momentum
    • Progressive Learning - Build skills progressively rather than overwhelming yourself
    • Genuine Transformation - Feel measurable changes in strength, flexibility, and mindfulness
    • Lasting Impact - Return home with sustainable practices you'll maintain

    üòä¬†Book your Sport

    Reset & Relax at the Deepest Level

    Five days creates the mental and physical space for profound transformation:

    • Day 1-2: Your nervous system begins to shift
    • Day 3: Deep relaxation and clarity emerge
    • Day 4-5: Integration and lasting change solidify

    Ice Bath Mastery

    With unlimited access over 5 days, you'll:

    • Build cold exposure tolerance safely
    • Experience cumulative benefits (immunity, mental resilience, recovery)
    • Learn proper technique from our experts
    • Understand how to use ice baths at home

    What to Bring

    ‚úì Comfortable, breathable workout clothes (2-3 sets)

    ‚úì Swimsuit for ice bath

    ‚úì Large towels

    ‚úì Water bottle (hydration is essential)

    ‚úì Personal care items

    ‚úì Journal (to track insights)

    ‚úì Open mind and adventurous spirit

    Preparation for Success

    Week Before Your Retreat

    • Start increasing water intake
    • Get quality sleep
    • Eat nourishing, whole foods
    • Prepare mentally for transformation
    • Notify us of any health conditions

    During Your 5 Days

    • Commit to attending all classes and workshops
    • Hydrate consistently (water is medicine)
    • Eat mindfully (we recommend local vegetarian options)
    • Journal daily reflections and insights
    • Connect authentically with other participants
    • Rest when your body needs it
